channel.title: BUscience
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUscience, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: World's oldest lizard wins fossil fight
item.description: A storeroom specimen that changed the origins of modern lizards by millions of years has had its identity confirmed.
